channel.title: Change the way you hold an item
channel.description: Hey there, is there a way to change the way you hold an item? for example, My char holds his AGS over his shoulder and if he attacks it attacks like a barrelchest anchor l0l

Hey there, is there a way to change the way you hold an item? for example, My char holds his AGS over his shoulder and if he attacks it attacks like a barrelchest anchor l0l
